data.name: Rondo Of Darkness. The Curse of Twin Moon
data.detailed_description:
A visual novel in the genre of otome, mysticism

This novella takes place in the lands of Idmund, where the Moon Goddess and the Night God rule and have been opposing each other for many years. Because of their feud, many spirits have begun to leave the lunar heavens and become either dark or light spirits so that people don't feel as strongly about the power of the gods.

For the gods, the idea with the spirits seemed fine and they made a temporary truce among themselves, but they transferred their anger to humans and spirits and a kind of game between the gods began.

The story of the novella will take place in the city of Idris, which lies between the kingdoms of Eden and Daath. Idris is considered a city of magic and invention, rich in history, the best universities and libraries, but the flaw of Idris is considered to be the great number of dark spirits that roam the city every night. The land on which the city itself sits is considered a place of attraction to the moon. There is a legend about the dangerous night of the Two Moons, when any spirit can become human again, but two people must be sacrificed in order to come alive.

Morella Vitae is the main character of the novella. She is a doctor and artifactologist from the small town of Fleur. At the request of her friend, she comes to Iris as an artifactologist to help the police investigate a series of attacks on Mayor Idris' house. With her, you'll delve into the town's ancient mysteries and perhaps find a couple more new ones.

Features:

üí´Three love interests.
üí´Bright locations
üí´Interesting characters

data.short_description: Life was ordinary for Morella Vitae, a doctor from the town of Fleur, until she received a letter from a friend asking her to come to Idris and help investigate a strange case.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1.4GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
